00030 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00031 #include "KviQString.h"
00032 
00033 #include <QObject>
00034 
00035 class TorrentInterface : public QObject
00036 {
00037 public:
00038         TorrentInterface() {}
00039         virtual ~TorrentInterface() {}
00040 
00041         virtual int detect() = 0;
00042 
00043         // returns number of torrents in client
00044         virtual int count()=0;
00045 
00046 /*
00047         // path of torrent file
00048         virtual QCString getTorrentFile(int i)=0;
00049 
00050         // directory where data is downloaded to
00051         virtual QCString getTorrentDataDir(int i)=0;
00052 */
00053         // number of files in torrent
00054         virtual int fileCount(int i)=0;
00055         // name of file in torrent
00056         virtual QString fileName(int i, int file)=0;
00057         // returns file priority (low, normal, high)
00058         virtual QString filePriority(int i, int file)=0;
00059         // sets file priority
00060         virtual bool setFilePriority(int i, int file, const QString &prio)=0;
00061 
00062         virtual bool start(int i)=0;
00063         virtual bool stop(int i)=0;
00064 
00065         virtual bool announce(int i)=0;
00066 
00067         virtual bool startAll()=0;
00068         virtual bool stopAll()=0;
00069 /*
00070         // remove torrent from client
00071         virtual bool removeTorrent(int i)=0;
00072 
00073         virtual bool addTorrent(const QCString &mrl);
00074 */
00075         // returns state of torrent number i (Stopped, Stalled, Seeding, Downloading)
00076         // this uses getTorrentInfo() to obtain the state and then
00077         // returns it as string
00078         virtual QString state(int i)=0;
00079 
00080         // name of torrent as displayed in client
00081         // uses getTorrentInfo()
00082         virtual QString name(int i)=0;
00083 
00084         virtual float speedUp()=0;
00085         virtual float speedDown()=0;
00086 
00087         virtual float trafficUp()=0;
00088         virtual float trafficDown()=0;
00089 
00090         virtual int maxUploadSpeed()=0;
00091         virtual int maxDownloadSpeed()=0;
00092 
00093         virtual bool setMaxUploadSpeed(int kbytes_per_sec)=0;
00094         virtual bool setMaxDownloadSpeed(int kbytes_per_sec)=0;
00095 
00096         QString lastError() { return m_lastError; }
00097 
00098         static void select(TorrentInterface *i) { m_selected = i; }
00099         static TorrentInterface *selected() { return m_selected; }
00100 
00101 protected:
00102         QString m_lastError;
00103         static TorrentInterface *m_selected;
00104 };
00105 
00106 class TorrentInterfaceDescriptor
00107 {
00108 public:
00109         TorrentInterfaceDescriptor() {};
00110         virtual ~TorrentInterfaceDescriptor() {};
00111 public:
00112         virtual const QString & name() = 0;
00113         virtual const QString & description() = 0;
00114         virtual TorrentInterface * instance() = 0;
00115 };
00116 
00117 #define TORR_DECLARE_DESCRIPTOR(_interfaceclass) \
00118         class _interfaceclass ## Descriptor : public TorrentInterfaceDescriptor \
00119         { \
00120         public: \
00121                 _interfaceclass ## Descriptor(); \
00122                 virtual ~_interfaceclass ## Descriptor(); \
00123         protected: \
00124                 _interfaceclass * m_pInstance; \
00125                 QString m_szName; \
00126                 QString m_szDescription; \
00127         public: \
00128                 virtual const QString & name(); \
00129                 virtual const QString & description(); \
00130                 virtual TorrentInterface * instance(); \
00131         };
00132 
00133 #define TORR_IMPLEMENT_DESCRIPTOR(_interfaceclass,_name,_description) \
00134         _interfaceclass ## Descriptor::_interfaceclass ## Descriptor() \
00135         : TorrentInterfaceDescriptor() \
00136         { \
00137                 m_pInstance = 0; \
00138                 m_szName = _name; \
00139                 m_szDescription = _description; \
00140         } \
00141         _interfaceclass ## Descriptor::~_interfaceclass ## Descriptor() \
00142         { \
00143                 delete m_pInstance; \
00144         } \
00145         const QString & _interfaceclass ## Descriptor::name() \
00146         { \
00147                 return m_szName; \
00148         } \
00149         const QString & _interfaceclass ## Descriptor::description() \
00150         { \
00151                 return m_szDescription; \
00152         } \
00153         TorrentInterface * _interfaceclass ## Descriptor::instance() \
00154         { \
00155                 if (!m_pInstance) m_pInstance = new _interfaceclass(); \
00156                 return m_pInstance; \
00157         }
